timeline.message: Started setting up ways to get creds and clients
Added support for get container properties
Added a bunch of network tests for container apis
Added some more commit block list tests
Added Access condition tests for blob delete

timeline.bodyText: Should we move any utils methods that are specific to storage or uses storage types to storage-package? core util should not have any dependency on storage or any other azure-sdk modules.
timeline.author: anuchandy

replies.bodyText: Yep! Will do. I think Rick just created a BlobTestUtils so I can move them there
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.message: Moved blob related things to blobs

timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: I think its cause we havent scrubbed quotes from etag yet, do we plan to do it? I could just flip the check for now
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.bodyText: Are these not present because we need to add them?
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: Yeah we can add them when we upgrade to 73

timeline.bodyText: I think we should change the name of this header or possibly remove it
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: We can handwrite public types and then this will go away. I will add this to our list

replies.bodyText: Added a comment in another test that also referenced this getter
